name: PRINCESS IN AIRINESS
description:
To pray for peace, the princess once again flies to the top of the holy tower!

The controls are simple. Just dragging and dropping with the mouse.
The farther you drag, the higher the strength. Then just drop her and watch her go!

Guide the princess on her way up the tower!

What kind of game is Princess in Airiness?

  • The farther you drag, the higher the strength. Then just drop her and watch her go! Includes a double jump!
  • On the way up, you'll encounter boss monsters -- ordinary methods won't work against these foes, so good luck!
  • How about trying to aim for the time attack leaderboard?
